description:
To make the most of a hot summer, the gang invites Suo-kun and Akari-chan for a day at the beach! As they`re all playing in the ocean, Akari-chan loses her floatie. Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to try to order it, but what appears is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sansan! Natsu no Umi o Mankitsu Dechi!
Shine! Enjoying the Sea in Summer!
サンサン! 夏の海をまんきつでち!
